website_summaries.verdict: These rashguard-style pants prioritize flexibility and breathability for active water sports.
pros: Made with 82% dacron and 18% spandex, these pants are lean, comfortable, and lightweight
Users raved about stretch and recovery of the pants, as well as the quick drying
Prevents the passage of 99% of ultraviolet lights with SPF 50 UV protection
Attractive blue and white maritime design
cons: Material is thin, and can be slightly transparent on white sections

customer_reviews.title: I love these things; its about time guys had a decent and stylish garmet for sun protection for legs
customer_reviews.text: I'm ordering more. these are the perfect undergarmet for scuba; and they can be worn by them selves for those warm water days too. I took my kiteboarding lessons in these things in 80 degree water and then scuba 100+ feet down under my wetsuit. they were fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic swim pants! Nice pants for those long days in the kayak or canoe! I don't like the hassle of constantly applying sunscreen but also don't like getting burnt. These are a perfect solution! They are breathable and don't get too hot. They are also very nice looking and feeling! I have a 31" waist, and these fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hero

customer_reviews.title: good product - check your size
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the many reviews I order a size larger than usual and now they fit perfect (at least for now...) The material is good quality and well made. The material sits comfortable on the skin too and dont seem to pull hairs. I want to use it to snorkel in Mozambique where I sometimes work. Perfect for keeping my form getting sunburns.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and really do an excellent job with simple snorkeling or beach combing. Very comfortable and quick drying.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Shakes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great for snorkeling and for keeping mosquitoes off during exploring coastline. I have two pairs and will but more!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Ended up returning as a bit see thru on the white parts when wet which is fine if you are a good looking 20 something but ...
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than what i needed. Ended up returning as a bit see thru on the white parts when wet which is fine if you are a good looking 20 something but not so much for a 30+ something dad going on a scuba dive trip.
customer_reviews.author: Fostersbeach

customer_reviews.title: No stirrups.
customer_reviews.text: Good but could have used stirrups on the heels for easy change into wetsuit. Just hook on heel and push thru wetsuit leg, will make it work. Other than that still effective as a second layer, and warm, and stretchy!
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These feel great and fit well. I think they'll be great for snorkeling in Cabo.......
customer_reviews.author: Bob O'Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkelling without sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: US L / Asian XXL fits 32" W. Don't forget some cheap socks to wear with your flippers and cover your ankles!
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Consumer

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT! I use them while sailing and swimming to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! I use them while sailing and swimming to protect my legs from the sun. People ask me all the time where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Lane

customer_reviews.title: My husband really like this product
customer_reviews.text: My husband really like this product, he is very happy wearing it in the pool or for a walk in the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Norma S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pants. Fit and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pants. Fit and feel great. They are snug which is what I want for Kitesurfing. Great for keeping the sun off.
customer_reviews.author: gtrplyr

customer_reviews.title: No sunburn!
customer_reviews.text: I sunburn very easily. I did not sunburn with these pants. Plus, they look great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerald B.

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great but run small so get larger size than normal.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: If you measure and check the size chart it will fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly BUT you need the read the size chart. I measured my son to ensure they fit. The sizes in the USA are different so make sure you measure and check the chart
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: great for in the water or a base layer in colder weather at work .very well made product!
customer_reviews.author: jim

product_meta.title: Panegy Men's Dive Lycra Pants Leggings Surf Snorkel Swimmer Rash Guard Tight
product_meta.description:
Features: 
Breathable and light weight Quick-dry design 
Excellent stretch and recovery maximize free body movement 
Protect your skin when you enjoy sunshine on beach 

Specifications: 
Material: 82% Nylon + 18% Spandex 
Asian Size M: Waist 26.4"; Hip 32.8"; Cuff 16.0"; Recommend Height 65.2"-67.2"; Recommend Weight 132 lbs
Asian Size L: Waist 28.0"; Hip 34.0"; Cuff 16.8"; Recommend Height 67.2"-69.2"; Recommend Weight 143 lbs
Asian Size XL: Waist 29.6"; Hip 34.8"; Cuff 17.6"; Recommend Height 69.2"-70.8"; Recommend Weight 154 lbs
Asian Size XXL: Waist 33.2"; Hip 36.0"; Cuff 19.2"; Recommend Height 70.8"-72.8"; Recommend Weight 176 lbs
Color: As pictures show 

Notice: 
The measurement may have 0.39"-1.18" inaccurate errors. 
There might be slight colour deviation due to different displays. 

Package includes: 1 * Swim Long Pants
feature_bullets: Material: 82% Dacron + 18% Spandex, breathable and wat perfect.
50+ U.V. protection, Can block 99% of harmful UV rays
Excellent stretch and recovery maximize free body movement, Quick-dry design, Lightweight.
Rash protection, Waterproof sting.Fits your body like a glove and let you swim as free as a fish
Included: 1pcs long pant. Please check the size chart careful before you make purchase decision. Recommend one size large.
